u w

| 6 | 5 | #P_xpeq1d | |- ( u = U -> ( ( BaseSet ` u ) X. { ( 0vec ` w ) } ) = ( X X. { ( 0vec ` w ) } ) ) |

| 9 | 8 | #P_sneqd | |- ( w = W -> { ( 0vec ` w ) } = { Z } ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_xpeq2d | |- ( w = W -> ( X X. { ( 0vec ` w ) } ) = ( X X. { Z } ) ) |

| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_xpex | |- ( X X. { Z } ) e. _V |
